name: RN apps: Verifying where the custom status appears (mobile)
objective:
Verifying where the custom status appears in:

  • Right Drawer

  • Post Header for Posts in Center Channel/Thread view

  • LHS DM list

  • DM channel info screen

  • User Profile Screen
precondition:
• Logged in
  • Custom statuses enabled on the server

inline.description:
1. Open the "Set a status" screen
  2. Click in the "Set a status" text field, enter a status text and select an emoji
  3. Click on Set Status
inline.expectedResult:
• "Set a status" screen is dismissed
  • Custom status is successfully set
Custom status is shown in the Right Drawer

inline.description: Create a post in a channel
inline.expectedResult: Custom status emoji is shown in the post header

inline.description: Tap on the previously created post to open the thread
inline.expectedResult: Thread view opens and the custom status emoji is shown in the post header

inline.description: Click on the username on the created post
inline.expectedResult: User popover opens and shows the full custom status

inline.description:
1. Open the hamburger menu and tap on the + button for Direct messages
2. Search for yourself (the logged-in user)
3. Select yourself and click "Go"
4. When the DM opens tap your name in the header
inline.expectedResult: Info screen opens and shows the custom status below the user's name

inline.description: Open the LHS menu and scroll to the DM list
inline.expectedResult: Status is shown next to your name in the LHS
